Specimen Type: Genomic DNA extracted from submitted specimens
Purpose: To generate, analyze, and report next-generation sequencing data for identifying genomic variants with clinical or research significance.
Container: Properly labeled specimen container as defined in accessioning SOPs for DNA extraction
Equipment: Spectrophotometer (e.g., NanoDrop), Fluorometer (e.g., Qubit), qPCR system, Bioanalyzer, NGS platforms (e.g., Illumina, ThermoFisher, PacBio), bioinformatics server
